phrases: Divorced?!
We will apparently be shipping off to Tokyo later this year.
Off to Tokyo...?
You are going to transfer schools?
Ah, I am not going.
I just have one more year until I graduate.
And college entrance exams are coming up, so she said it would be okay if I stayed here.
Either way, though, I will still be going to college there.
I see... do not scare me like that, geez.
Less talking, more eating.
Yeah.
I will be done soon.
Hey runts, what are you doing today on your day off?
Ice skating.
All right, I am done.
Masa, leave after you have cleaned your dishes.
Masa, it is going to get dark out if you are this slow!
Hurry and get your stuff ready!
By the way...
Yes?
Were you the one who suggested staying behind?
I am asking whether or not you told your mom you wanted to stay.
Yeah, I guess... but she was the one who said it would be fine to stay if I wanted to.
So I said, Oh... okay.
We can go now.
So you have thought a lot about it.
Even if I have not...
Hey...
I thought I would tell you today, but...
What is it?
I confessed my feelings to Takahashi.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Doushite umaku ikanai wa
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kono unmei bakari I love
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Atsui omoi wo uketomete
Doko made mo tsunagattetai
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 23 ...
When?
Two days ago.
That is dirty.
While I was sick in bed, you...
Yeah.
I tend to be good at playing dirty, I guess.
Are not you going to ask how she responded?
Sorry.
I am going home for today.
Do not jump to conclusions...
If I had not confessed, do you really think two guys would go ice skating on a Sunday morning like this-
We have known each other since the sixth grade.
Do not underestimate that, moron.
What?
You are back already?
Yeah...
As soon as I told him that I confessed to Takahashi, he went blue in the face.
What is up with that?
You serious?!
W-What?
Good job, man!
Let me say something...
I think you already know, but...
Both of you, even.
Nothing's changed.
So little has changed between us that it is sad.
But she did not refuse you, did she?
How... did you know?
You have always only taken challenges when the odds are in your favor.
I see now.
I can understand why Moto would get so upset about this.
So?
How did you handle yourself in this little challenge?
I want to protect you, Takahashi!
Umm...
Ah, do not give me your answer right now.
I do not intend to accept any answer but yes.
I am not taking this lightly, and I am not confessing just for the hell of it.
Even if you refuse me, it will not stop me from loving you.
In other words, I have decided to live with and accept these feelings.
Which is why...
I will be waiting.
If it ever gets hard on you, or you cannot bear with it any longer...
Because...
I will always be waiting for you.
I will always be waiting for you.
Takeuchi-kun told me...
You do not have to give me your answer right now.
Thank goodness he said that...
Because I do not want to hurt him... and in the first place, it is just impossible...
But...
I will be waiting.
Mizu-chin?
Nana, have you made up with Yano?
No... not yet.
Huh?
But did not you go to see him when he was sick?
No... I did not end up going in the end.
Then you have not gotten in touch with him at all?
No...
What are you planning on doing?
I do not know...
Mizu-chin, I do not know... my head's so mixed up...
Did something happen?
No... it is just that...
What happened?
I cannot understand his feelings at all.
I planned on giving it all my effort, but I keep on giving up at some point...
I must be such horrible girlfriend...
All relationships are like this.
Do not blame yourself so much.
Like Takeuchi-kun said...
Anyway, when you see him at school tomorrow, be sure to kiss and make up!
I wonder if I will never be able to understand Yano...
No, that is not true!
If I am pessimistic about it, it is all over!
If I am pessimistic about it...
I want to become stronger...
Gym Class: Snow Shoveling
This sucks!
It is so cold out...
Gym class first thing on first day of the week... we are so unlucky.
I am going to put on extra clothes for this.
Ah, good morning-
Let us hurry and get going.
Yeah.
Takahashi!
Long time no see.
Ah... I ignored him.
Ah, I am not being sarcastic or anything.
It is not like I was miserable that my girlfriend did not come to see me the three days I was out sick or anything.
After all, I have such a big...
Hey.
Ah, so it is begun...
Yano, do not play tag!
It is no good, after all...
Takahashi!
Wait up!
I am scared to talk to Yano.
Get a grip already!
Do not make me feel worse than I already do!
I just got over a cold... geez!
That is different from what you just said...
Obviously!
Guys have their outward appearance, and they have their real feelings.
Understand?
Everything I am about to say are my real feelings.
I was incredibly lonely when you did not come to visit, call, or even send a text message.
No matter how angry you may have been, that was just cruel.
It made me feel miserable.
Like I was no better than a flea or something.
And I hate playing tag, too.
Get a grip and talk to me again.
Please... talk to me again.
Yeah.
I am sorry, too...
If I could just say that, we would be back to normal.
But...
Takahashi... do not you want to make up with me?
Yano... are you sure...
In truth...
I cannot say it very well...
I am not confident...
No, that is not right... but...
I cannot stop.
Are you sure we are really meant for each other?
Should not you want someone who can...
No...
I know I can understand him a whole lot more than you can!
He is definitely going to say no, right?
Will he deny it...?
He is going to, is not he...?
Someone... who can understand me differently than you can?
You are saying someone else would be better for me?
I did not say that.
You did...
You did!
Why do you keep saying things... that only make me more uneasy?
I just cannot...
Takahashi!
Why cannot we do something so easy...?
Or is it just so easy that it seems hard?
Motoharu, could you help me out?
The ground's frozen, and I cannot get the shovel in.
Guess we are out of luck.
Then in the spring, could you dig up those seedlings and send them to me?
I have been thinking about it, but...
You planted a ton of rose seedlings in the spring...
Have you really been thinking about this divorce for a year now?
I could not help it.
Gardening is the only thing I take pleasure in.
In the end, you only think of things impulsively.
When you want something, you get it without thinking of the consequences.
Your marriage gets jumbled, whether or not to get divorce gets jumbled, digging things up gets jumbled...
It is all a big nuisance, you know.
I did not give birth to you impulsively.
I was talking about the saplings.
And you were thinking of growing those on the veranda?
Are you dumb?
Ow!
The thorns hurt like hell.
D-Do not cry!
It is just that...
I am sorry.
I have just been a little on edge since this morning.
It just seems like you are always blaming me...
I have never blamed you for anything.
Yes, that is right, is not it?
Even when I said I wanted to get married, you followed me without saying a word.
I found someone I want to marry...
Without once complaining.
If it will make you happy, Mom...
This must be my guilty conscious.
You better be happy this time.
I will confess.
I gave birth to you on a whim.
How am I not surprised...
It was an unexpected pregnancy.
I had never once thought of wanting a kid.
But I was also scared of aborting you.
But then I thought, maybe if I gave birth...
But it did not work out that well.
Well, of course.
You are the worst.
That is right.
Everything's always either hit or miss with me, and unplanned.
No forethought to anything.
No matter what I do or achieve, it always ends up failure.
As a woman and a mother, I am the worst.
I have not thought of becoming happy, this late in life.
Then why are you getting divorced?
So I can really stand on my own two feet.
How old are you?
Forty-two.
Got a problem with that?
But... there is one thing I did succeed in.
Though I thought I had messed up at first.
It was just so unexpected at the time, and I regretted it severely.
Motoharu.
I am glad I gave birth to you.
Because of that, I am grateful that I was just a girl who never thought ahead.
You have given me enough happiness.
I could not wish for more.
This is pretty interesting.
Want To take a look, Nana?
Could I borrow it?
Takahashi.
What are your plans for today?
If you have no other plans, want to go home together?
I am going to go home by myself today.
Hey, Nana...
Yano!
Do not follow me!
Is this really all right?
Is what all right?
If you leave it like this, you two will really break up.
Then, what am I supposed to do?
Even if I talked with him now, we will only go further in the wrong direction...
Maybe, but because you are having such a hard time, you need to take that step.
Nana, you spend too much time on those things.
I have thought this for a while, but even though Yano's chasing you now...
If you disconnect from Yano's feelings now, it will be too late.
Take a good look...
Yano!
Do you really think he will chase you forever?
Do you really think that?
Mizu-chin's words keep echoing in my head...
If you disconnect from Yano's feelings now, it will be too late.
It will be too late.
I am sorry.
I take back what I said.
Take back what?
The words I said two years ago.
When I said that you only used me to get revenge on my sister.
You did not do it for revenge.
You did it out of sympathy for me.
Either way, there is no changing the fact that it was the worst thing we could have done.
I Am About To kimi ga iikaketa kotoba ga
Yubisaki ni sotto oritekita
Nanimo iwanakute ii yo
Tsumaida yubi wo gyutto atatamete
Kotoba wa kotoba dakara kokoro hanbun mo tsutaenai kara
Setsunakute modokashikute yuuyake futari wo tsutsundeiru
Komiageru mune no omoi kokoro ga itai yo
Setsunakute modokashikute kaerenai kono mama aruiteitai
Yabaisaki ni kanjiteiru kokoro no kotoba wo
The words you were just about to say
fell softly onto my fingertips.
You do not have to say anything.
I will clasp your hand tightly and warm it up.
Because words are words, I cannot express half of the feelings in my heart.
It is so wrenching and irritating as the sunset engulfs the two of us.
My heart aches from all the feelings welling up inside of me.
It is so wrenching and irritating that I cannot go home.
I want to keep walking like this.
I feel the words from your heart on my fingertips.
Episode 24 Preview...
Are you actually thinking of going with your mom?!
Why do I have to keep giving you those chances?
With women, if you are not...
I have had enough of this regret.
This is bad...
He seriously might go...
Yano's... going to leave?
